body.name: Reebok Women's Underwear - Seamless Hipster Briefs (3 Pack)

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Black Jacquard/ Irish Cream/ Four Leaf Clover

features: Seamless hipster briefs disappear under clothes with a smooth, tag-free feel
Nylon spandex fabric is soft, lightweight & moisture-wicking
Low rise fit with natural leg openings sits comfortably on hips & thighs
Includes 3 pairs of black, sage green & black spacedye hipster panties
Machine washable underwear for easy care
body.description: Reebok Women's Seamless Hipster Panties will disappear under your clothes. The fashionable cut of our performance underwear delivers a neat invisible look all day long. You'll notice the softness right away due to the lightweight material and seam free knit style, ideal for exercise, dance, yoga, sleep, and lounging around the house. Soft and Breathable nylon/spandex blend fabric gives you the smooth feel you've been looking for under all of your favorite clothes. Comfort Fit Panties have stay-in-place legs that cover the hips and thighs to reduce ride-up, while the soft material lays smoothly without any bunching or pinching. Moisture Wicking blend fabric is breathable and keeps you dry, no matter what the outfit or occasion.Value Pack includes three pairs of hipster panties in different colors so you can match with all your outfits.Easy to Clean - Simply machine wash and dry; Please Reference the Variations for all Available Sizes and ColorsReebok Women Offers Premium Clothing at Affordable Prices because we value every customer that visits our listings! Stop by Our Storefront to See the Rest of Our Great Deals; we're confident you're going to find items that anyone who needs a gift will really appreciate!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #170,686 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #197 in Women's Hipster Panties

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 5’7 120lbs, size 24 pants, ordered size small. Fits well, as expected. I love these. I sleep in them in the summer, and they are so light, midrise, and great quality. I have surgical scars on my abdomen, pelvis, and glute and these feel like wearing nothing. Definitely recommend if looking for something midrise, full coverage, and have sensitive skin. I also love that these don’t move around or ride up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: I bought these based on a review of "best undies to wear while running." These are great. lightweight, covers all the important areas, and stays in place. I will be buying another pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy, but...
reviews.reviewText: I frickin love these panties. They are comfy, somehow make my pancake butt look like it has some semblance of shape (at least as much as it is possible to do so), and are ridiculously adorable.But.I hate that there has to be a but. Butt (see what I did there?) these otherwise awesome panties have two flaws. First, one of the reasons I bought them was so that I could wear a pad overnight during the heaviest days of my period, but my pads won't stick to them. I've used pads for decades and never had this issue, even with fancy panties, so it's definitely something about the material of these panties. If you're hoping to use these to hold a pad in place, beware.Also, the red panty (my favorite -_-) started shredding in the wash. Only the spare fabric by a seam was affected, and the panty is still totally intact, but I was picking long, tangled strands off my clothing and out of the wash for a week. This was particularly concerning because my idiot cat will eat and be sickened by any spare string he finds--including the string that came off of these panties. Fortunately, I was able to collect it all and toss it out before I saw him, as I was away at the time, but I know I will have to be on the lookout moving forward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I found a set of these underwear at a discount store and haven't been able to find more. Ordered from Amazon as they had many different patterns and colors. (Score!) I have a short waist and any type of underwear will stick out from the top of these pants. Not these. Love them, how they wash up and wear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and fit exactly as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Figured I would try these out and glad I did they are very comfortable, stretchy underwear. They do run on the bigger side since they are stretchy so the next set I get will size down. They are still very noticable under leggings due to the not so seamless leg openings in the underwear. But otherwise a very god nice lair if underwear for working out in or just for everyday use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but already unthreading after just 1 wash
reviews.reviewText: Love these undies but after just one wash, the threading at the waist is already coming undone. I do wash these on a delicate cycle but none the less when removing removing them, there’s a nest of thread wadded up around them. I will reconsider ordering more.
Very comfy but cutting is big. Advisable to down a size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Really happy good fit and comfortable, arrived early, thank you.
